HomePage.title: Welcome to Sealord Landing
HomePage.description: This is a simple test page for multi-language support.

SkipperPage.metaTitle: Sealord Skipper - Premium Pet Food | New Zealand Made
SkipperPage.metaDescription: Discover Skipper - 100% New Zealand-made premium pet food with high-quality seafood protein. Register now for special offers and be the first to know when Skipper launches near you.
SkipperPage.heroTitle: Something Beautiful Is Coming for Your Pets
SkipperPage.intro1: Get ready - Skipper is almost here! Proudly 100% New Zealand-made, Skipper is redefining pet nutrition with premium seafood and inspired recipes crafted for the love of pets and the love of the sea.
SkipperPage.intro2: Register here and be the first to discover when Skipper launches near you. You will also receive a special introductory offer and samples for your pet to try.
SkipperPage.formTitle: Yes, I'd like to receive a special offer.
SkipperPage.feature1Desc: Carefully crafted where purity endures, at the edge of the world's wild, untamed oceans.
SkipperPage.feature2Desc: High-quality protein supports strength, energy and lifelong health for happy, thriving pets.
SkipperPage.feature3Desc: Low-allergen pet food supports digestion, reduces sensitivities and promotes healthier, active pets.
SkipperPage.feature4Desc: Skipper Pet Food uses only natural, nutrient-rich ingredients sourced from fish sustainably caught by Sealord.
SkipperPage.feature5Desc: Omega-3 supports healthy skin, shiny coats, joint mobility and overall pet wellbeing.
SkipperPage.footerTitle: Made by Sealord - New Zealand's No.1 Seafood Company
SkipperPage.footerDesc: With decades of experience and deep respect for the ocean, Sealord crafts sustainably caught seafood for pets who deserve the best. Every Skipper recipe is made with care, innovation, and a commitment to quality - protecting our oceans for generations to come.
